# ARC Realistic Survival English language file
# key=value (missing keys will be appended at runtime)

# Thirst System (samples)
THIRST_PREFIX=[Thirst]
THIRST_VALUE=Current Thirst: {value}
THIRST_DECREASED=Your thirst decreased by {amount}
THIRST_INCREASED=Your thirst increased by {amount}
THIRST_LOW_WARNING=Your thirst is low. Drink something!
THIRST_EFFECT_APPLIED=Effect applied: {effect} for {seconds} seconds

# Tips/Errors (samples)
PLAYER_ONLY_COMMAND=This command is for players only
SHOP_PANEL_ERROR=Failed to open panel. Try again later
